title: Azure Function Bridge
description: For scenarios where there is no direct support for functionality in the Azure Data Factory feature set, BimlFlex uses an included Azure Function Bridge ('Function Bridge') as a means to provide the missing functionality.

frontMatter.name: The BimlFlex utility Azure Function Bridge
frontMatter.Summary: The BimlFlex generated Azure Function Bridge provides bridge features to support file operations and to support calls to unsupported technology or services.

next.title: Azure Resource Manager templates for BimlFlex
